price: Allah vam je propisao kako da svoje zakletve iskupite; Allah je vaš Gospodar; On je Sveznajući i Mudri.
arabic: قَدۡ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qad faraḍa al-lahu lakum taḥillata aymānikum wal-lahu mawlākum wahuwa al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
